question: Which of the following clearly defines 'Batai' which was reintroduced during the time of Ranit Singh?
option1: The land where cultivation occurred throughout the whole year
option2: The land where cultivation occurred at least half of a year
option3: The proportion of the crop which was divided between Peasant and the Government
option4: The charge levied on the basis of land holdings
answer: The proportion of the crop which was divided between Peasant and the Government
explanation: The Batai system was first started during the time of the Mughal era. During the time of Ranjit Singh, it was reintroduced. This system helped to distribute crops between the cultivators and the Government in a fixed proportion. It lasted till 1823.
